marklogic.body: Because their was no visible injuries he must be lying about defending himself? doesn't this Trayvon families atty know that in scenes like that the EMT are Always on the scene and they clean you up before cops take you in? when you have a broken nose it's not like you are Bleeding to death and can be clean up by emt which is usually the case before they take you into their station. This atty seems like a quick of judgement blabber mouth and it might just hurt him.
